channel.title: Crappy first script
channel.description:
This is a crappy first scar-I didn't even LOOK at a tut, so don't expect that AWESOME smooth mouse circle.
[scar]///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////// //created by geel9 //crappy first script //interested in games? then this is for you. //directions: //press the green arrow. see it? Good boy. //now here's the hard part. you have to click it! //yes, that's right! click it! then just sit back. //whew! that was hard! ///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////// program gamechat; begin writeln ('ok, ok, I know you have no good games, right? Id like a talk.') wait(4000) writeln ('Runescape is awesome. when you get on, add "heikabuchi" and') wait(4000) writeln ('beg for lots of gold. tell him a man named city24 sent you.') wait(4000) writeln ('i will pay you.') wait(4000) writeln ('have you ever played "flash trek"?I have.') wait(4000) writeln ('here is the url. enjoy your flashy experiences!') wait(4000) openwebpage ('www.verxiang.com') wait(4000) writeln ('are you still there?') wait(4000) writeln ('good. May I interest you in mofunzone? a great gaming community.') wait(4000) writeln ('yes? Great! Hold on. Accessing the all-powerful internet.') wait(4000) openwebpage ('http://www.mofunzone.com') wait (4000) writeln ('Still there?') wait(4000) writeln ('I thought so. Flyff is good.') wait(4000) writeln ('it lets you fly for fun-that is the name.') wait (4000) writeln ('go here...') wait(4000) openwebpage ('http://www.flyff.gpotato.com') wait(4000) writeln ('hello? STILL THERE?! none of the games INTERESTED YOU?!') wait(4000) writeln ('fine! have it your way-go play runescape! geeze...') wait(2000) openwebpage ('http://www.runescape.com') end. [/scar]

item.title: Crappy first script
item.dc:creator: @Areithe Areithe
item.description:
@Areithe wrote:

[quote=“HISTORY, post:8, topic:33217”][quote author=Akriam link=topic=47950.msg590268#msg590268 date=1165654964]
I did not put typesend: I believe it is just typesend(’’), but I could be wrong.
[/quote]typesend(’’); and typesend(’’) are the same thing lol

Btw cant understand te meaning of this script:P[/quote]
I dunno what it is for too…it is just a first script and he was trying to get familiar with all the functions, etc.

Read full topic

item.title: Crappy first script
item.dc:creator: @slinkyman24 slinkyman24
item.description:
@slinkyman24 wrote:

[quote=“Akriam, post:2, topic:33217”][quote author=geel9 link=topic=47950.msg588439#msg588439 date=1165638416]
This is a crappy first scar-I didn’t even LOOK at a tut, so don’t expect that AWESOME smooth mouse circle.

[scar]/////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
//created by geel9
//crappy first script
//interested in games? then this is for you.
//directions:
//press the green arrow. see it? Good boy.
//now here’s the hard part. you have to click it!
//yes, that’s right! click it! then just sit back.
//whew! that was hard!
/////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
program gamechat;
begin
writeln (‘ok, ok, I know you have no good games, right? Id like a talk.’)
wait(4000)
writeln (‘Runescape is awesome. when you get on, add “heikabuchi” and’)
wait(4000)
writeln (‘beg for lots of gold. tell him a man named city24 sent you.’)
wait(4000)
writeln (‘i will pay you.’)
wait(4000)
writeln (‘have you ever played “flash trek”?I have.’)
wait(4000)
writeln (‘here is the url. enjoy your flashy experiences!’)
wait(4000)
openwebpage (‘www.verxiang.com’)
wait(4000)
writeln (‘are you still there?’)
wait(4000)
writeln (‘good. May I interest you in mofunzone? a great gaming community.’)
wait(4000)
writeln (‘yes? Great! Hold on. Accessing the all-powerful internet.’)
wait(4000)
openwebpage (‘http://www.mofunzone.com’)
wait (4000)
writeln (‘Still there?’)
wait(4000)
writeln (‘I thought so. Flyff is good.’)
wait(4000)
writeln (‘it lets you fly for fun-that is the name.’)
wait (4000)
writeln (‘go here…’)
wait(4000)
openwebpage (‘http://www.flyff.gpotato.com’)
wait(4000)
writeln (‘hello? STILL THERE?! none of the games INTERESTED YOU?!’)
wait(4000)
writeln (‘fine! have it your way-go play runescape! geeze…’)
wait(2000)
openwebpage (‘http://www.runescape.com’)
end.
[/scar]
[/quote]

Pretty good for a first script, but are you trying to make it type in-game? It should be :

[scar]
typesend:
[/scar]

Also you should include SRL. The openwebpage thing doesn’t type that it, it actually opens a web page I think.

Here:

[Scar]
{.include.SRL/SRL.Scar}
/////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
//created by geel9
//crappy first script
//interested in games? then this is for you.
//directions:
//press the green arrow. see it? Good boy.
//now here’s the hard part. you have to click it!
//yes, that’s right! click it! then just sit back.
//whew! that was hard!
/////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
program gamechat;
begin
Typesend (‘ok, ok, I know you have no good games, right? Id like a talk.’)
wait(4000)
Typesend (‘Runescape is awesome. when you get on, add “heikabuchi” and’)
wait(4000)
Typesend (‘beg for lots of gold. tell him a man named city24 sent you.’)
wait(4000)
TypeSend (‘i will pay you.’)
wait(4000)
TypeSend(‘have you ever played “flash trek”?I have.’)
wait(4000)
Typesend (‘here is the url. enjoy your flashy experiences!’)
wait(4000)
Typesend (‘www.verxiang.com’)
wait(4000)
Typesend (‘are you still there?’)
wait(4000)
Typesend (‘good. May I interest you in mofunzone? a great gaming community.’)
wait(4000)
Typesend (‘yes? Great! Hold on. Accessing the all-powerful internet.’)
wait(4000)
Typesend (‘http://www.mofunzone.com’)
wait (4000)
Typesend (‘Still there?’)
wait(4000)
Typesend (‘I thought so. Flyff is good.’)
wait(4000)
Typesend (‘it lets you fly for fun-that is the name.’)
wait (4000)
Typesend (‘go here…’)
wait(4000)
Typesend (‘http://www.flyff.gpotato.com’)
wait(4000)
Typesend (‘hello? STILL THERE?! none of the games INTERESTED YOU?!’)
wait(4000)
Typesend (‘fine! have it your way-go play runescape! geeze…’)
wait(2000)
Typesend (‘http://www.runescape.com’)
end.
[/scar]

Also try adding random waits:

[scar]
wait(4000+random(3000))
[/scar]

Another suggestions would be to make it send the message only if the person want to:

[scar]
If (IsFKeyDown(1)) Then
TypeSend(‘Hi’)
[/scar][/quote]
you are actually wrong i think.

it is not

typesend:

it is

typesend;just change that and it should be good

Read full topic

item.title: Crappy first script
item.dc:creator: @Akriam Akriam
item.description:
@Akriam wrote:

[quote=“geel9, post:1, topic:33217”]This is a crappy first scar-I didn’t even LOOK at a tut, so don’t expect that AWESOME smooth mouse circle.

[scar]/////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
//created by geel9
//crappy first script
//interested in games? then this is for you.
//directions:
//press the green arrow. see it? Good boy.
//now here’s the hard part. you have to click it!
//yes, that’s right! click it! then just sit back.
//whew! that was hard!
/////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
program gamechat;
begin
writeln (‘ok, ok, I know you have no good games, right? Id like a talk.’)
wait(4000)
writeln (‘Runescape is awesome. when you get on, add “heikabuchi” and’)
wait(4000)
writeln (‘beg for lots of gold. tell him a man named city24 sent you.’)
wait(4000)
writeln (‘i will pay you.’)
wait(4000)
writeln (‘have you ever played “flash trek”?I have.’)
wait(4000)
writeln (‘here is the url. enjoy your flashy experiences!’)
wait(4000)
openwebpage (‘www.verxiang.com’)
wait(4000)
writeln (‘are you still there?’)
wait(4000)
writeln (‘good. May I interest you in mofunzone? a great gaming community.’)
wait(4000)
writeln (‘yes? Great! Hold on. Accessing the all-powerful internet.’)
wait(4000)
openwebpage (‘http://www.mofunzone.com’)
wait (4000)
writeln (‘Still there?’)
wait(4000)
writeln (‘I thought so. Flyff is good.’)
wait(4000)
writeln (‘it lets you fly for fun-that is the name.’)
wait (4000)
writeln (‘go here…’)
wait(4000)
openwebpage (‘http://www.flyff.gpotato.com’)
wait(4000)
writeln (‘hello? STILL THERE?! none of the games INTERESTED YOU?!’)
wait(4000)
writeln (‘fine! have it your way-go play runescape! geeze…’)
wait(2000)
openwebpage (‘http://www.runescape.com’)
end.
[/scar][/quote]

Pretty good for a first script, but are you trying to make it type in-game? It should be :

[scar]
typesend:
[/scar]

Also you should include SRL. The openwebpage thing doesn’t type that it, it actually opens a web page I think.

Here:

[Scar]
{.include.SRL/SRL.Scar}
/////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
//created by geel9
//crappy first script
//interested in games? then this is for you.
//directions:
//press the green arrow. see it? Good boy.
//now here’s the hard part. you have to click it!
//yes, that’s right! click it! then just sit back.
//whew! that was hard!
/////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
program gamechat;
begin
Typesend (‘ok, ok, I know you have no good games, right? Id like a talk.’)
wait(4000)
Typesend (‘Runescape is awesome. when you get on, add “heikabuchi” and’)
wait(4000)
Typesend (‘beg for lots of gold. tell him a man named city24 sent you.’)
wait(4000)
TypeSend (‘i will pay you.’)
wait(4000)
TypeSend(‘have you ever played “flash trek”?I have.’)
wait(4000)
Typesend (‘here is the url. enjoy your flashy experiences!’)
wait(4000)
Typesend (‘www.verxiang.com’)
wait(4000)
Typesend (‘are you still there?’)
wait(4000)
Typesend (‘good. May I interest you in mofunzone? a great gaming community.’)
wait(4000)
Typesend (‘yes? Great! Hold on. Accessing the all-powerful internet.’)
wait(4000)
Typesend (‘http://www.mofunzone.com’)
wait (4000)
Typesend (‘Still there?’)
wait(4000)
Typesend (‘I thought so. Flyff is good.’)
wait(4000)
Typesend (‘it lets you fly for fun-that is the name.’)
wait (4000)
Typesend (‘go here…’)
wait(4000)
Typesend (‘http://www.flyff.gpotato.com’)
wait(4000)
Typesend (‘hello? STILL THERE?! none of the games INTERESTED YOU?!’)
wait(4000)
Typesend (‘fine! have it your way-go play runescape! geeze…’)
wait(2000)
Typesend (‘http://www.runescape.com’)
end.
[/scar]

Also try adding random waits:

[scar]
wait(4000+random(3000))
[/scar]

Another suggestions would be to make it send the message only if the person want to:

[scar]
If (IsFKeyDown(1)) Then
TypeSend(‘Hi’)
[/scar]

Read full topic

item.title: Crappy first script
item.dc:creator: @geel9 geel9
item.description:
@geel9 wrote:

This is a crappy first scar-I didn’t even LOOK at a tut, so don’t expect that AWESOME smooth mouse circle.

[scar]/////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
//created by geel9

/////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
program gamechat;
begin
writeln (‘ok, ok, I know you have no good games, right? Id like a talk.’)
wait(4000)
writeln (‘Runescape is awesome. when you get on, add “heikabuchi” and’)

wait(4000)
writeln (‘i will pay you.’)
wait(4000)
writeln (‘have you ever played “flash trek”?I have.’)

wait(4000)
writeln (‘are you still there?’)
wait(4000)
writeln (‘good. May I interest you in mofunzone? a great gaming community.’)
wait(4000)
writeln (‘yes? Great! Hold on. Accessing the all-powerful internet.’)
wait(4000)
openwebpage (‘http://www.mofunzone.com’)
wait (4000)
writeln (‘Still there?’)
wait(4000)
writeln (‘I thought so. Flyff is good.’)
wait(4000)
writeln (‘it lets you fly for fun-that is the name.’)
wait (4000)
writeln (‘go here…’)
wait(4000)
openwebpage (‘http://www.flyff.gpotato.com’)
wait(4000)
writeln (‘hello? STILL THERE?! none of the games INTERESTED YOU?!’)
wait(4000)
writeln (‘fine! have it your way-go play runescape! geeze…’)

openwebpage (‘http://www.runescape.com’)
end.
[/scar]
